Package org.neo4j.harness

Interface Neo4jBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Neo4jConfigurator<Neo4jBuilder>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInProcessNeo4jBuilder, InProcessNeo4jBuilder
    public interface Neo4jBuilder
extends Neo4jConfigurator<Neo4jBuilder>
    Builder for constructing and starting Neo4j for test purposes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Neo4j build()
      Start new neo4j instance.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.harness.Neo4jConfigurator

        copyFrom, copyFrom, withAggregationFunction, withConfig, withDisabledServer, withExtensionFactories, withFixture, withFixture, withFixture, withFixture, withFunction, withProcedure, withUnmanagedExtension, withUnmanagedExtension, withWorkingDir, withWorkingDir

    • Method Detail

      • build

        Neo4j build()
        Start new neo4j instance. By default, the neo4j server will listen on random free port, and you can determine where to connect using the Neo4j.httpURI() method. You could also specify explicit ports using the Neo4jConfigurator.withConfig(Setting, Object) method or disable web server completely. Please refer to the Neo4j Manual for details on available configuration options.
